elements.name: Test a visitor can view all the books in his shopping basket

steps.name: that I have added books to my shopping basket
I click the shopping bag icon
I land on the shopping bag page
I can see all the books in my shopping basket

elements.name: Test a visitor can filter the search result

steps.name: I have done a search using a valid search term
I see a certain amount of items
I filter using a sub-keyword
The results are filtered to display a smaller amount of items

elements.name: Test visitors can remove books from their shopping basket

steps.name: I am on shopping basket page
I click the remove from basket button for a listed book
the book is deleted from my shopping basket

elements.name: Test visitors can add books to their shopping basket

steps.name: I am on a product detail page
I select the size/color/amount
I click the add to basket button
the product is added to my shopping basket

elements.name: Test visitors can navigate to the book details page

steps.name: I am on a product lister page
I select one of the items
I am on the Product detail page of the selected item
I can see details of the product

elements.name: Test Checkout with incorrect delivery details

steps.name: I have added an item to my shopping bag
I click the shopping bag icon
I proceed to check out
I select a payment method
I enter invalid details
I click the pay button
I receive feedback that the purchase details are incorrect

elements.name: Test a visitor can Checkout items in his basket

steps.name: I have added an item to my shopping bag
I proceed to the check out
I enter valid delivery details
I select a payment method
I I confirm the order
I am redirected to the thank you page

elements.name: Test a visitor can change his locale

steps.name: I am logged in
I navigate to the locale selector page
I select USA as a country
The US site is shown

elements.name: Test a visitor can change his locale

steps.name: I am logged in
I navigate to the locale selector page
I select Portugal as a country
The PT site is shown

elements.name: Test a visitor can change his locale

steps.name: I am logged in
I navigate to the locale selector page
I select Spain as a country

elements.name: Test a visitor can change his locale

steps.name: I am logged in
I navigate to the locale selector page

elements.name: Test a logged in visitor can edit the default address

steps.name: I am logged in on the site
I navigate to the personal information page
I navigate to the default address page
I change my street name
I receive feedback that my account is updated

elements.name: Test a logged in visitor can edit the account details

steps.name: I am logged in on the site
I navigate to the personal information page
I update my details
I receive feedback that my account is updated

elements.name: Test logged in visitors can Logout from their account

steps.name: I am logged in on the site
I click the Log out button
I receive feedback that I am logged out
I cannot visit my account page anymore

elements.name: Test visitors can Login to Book Store Website

steps.name: I am not logged in
I am on the log in page
I enter my username
I enter my password
I click the login button
I am on logged in
